body:
Files: src/compiler/wasm-call-descriptors.{h,cc}, src/compiler/linkage.{h,cc}, src/wasm/wasm-linkage.h
- compiler::GetWasmCallDescriptor usage in wrappers:
  - wasm/wrappers.cc: BuildCallWasmFromWrapper uses TSCallDescriptor::Create(GetWasmCallDescriptor(zone, sig, WasmCallKind::kWasmIndirectFunction), CanThrow::kYes, ...), performing indirect wasm call from wrapper.
- Linkage descriptors for JS/builtins:
  - compiler::Linkage::GetJSCallDescriptor(zone, is_construct=false, parameter_count, flags): used in BuildWasmToJSWrapper for JSFunction calls.
  - compiler::Linkage::GetStubCallDescriptor(zone, Descriptor, stack_param_count, flags, properties, StubCallMode): used extensively for Builtins (WasmInt32ToHeapNumber, WasmTaggedToFloat64, CallTrampolineDescriptor, WasmRethrowExplicitContext, etc.).
- WasmCallDescriptors (class): src/compiler/wasm-call-descriptors.h provides BigIntToI64 call descriptors (and i32-pair variant on 32-bit). WasmWrapperTSGraphBuilder::GetBigIntToI64CallDescriptor(needs_frame_state) calls into WasmEngine()->call_descriptors().
- wasm/wasm-linkage.h: Defines platform calling convention arrays kGpParamRegisters/kFpParamRegisters and return registers per-arch; kWasmInstanceDataParameterIndex specifies implicit arg slot. Also defines LinkageAllocator and LinkageLocationAllocator to compute register/stack slots for wasm calls and wrapper parameter passing; includes kGenericJSToWasmWrapperParamBufferMaxSize constant used by js-to-wasm builtins.
- compiler/wasm-compiler.cc shows BuildWasmCall, BuildWasmReturnCall wiring of GetWasmCallDescriptor to operators and tail calls, mirroring wrapper code usage.
explanation: Collects the call descriptor and calling convention helpers relevant for wrapper generation paths, anchoring the use of GetWasmCallDescriptor, GetJSCallDescriptor, GetStubCallDescriptor, and WasmCallDescriptors support for BigInt↔i64 conversion.
